aboutPage.title: About GəncFit
aboutPage.storyText: GəncFit platform was created with the support of the Youth Foundation of the Republic of Azerbaijan. This initiative was born out of the desire to create an environment that meets the needs of young people in the country, helping them lead a healthy, balanced, and socially active life.
aboutPage.missionText: We are here to ensure that young people spend their free time effectively, healthily, and beneficially. GəncFit aims to improve their quality of life by offering them the right choices.
aboutPage.offerText: On the GəncFit platform, you can join activity areas that suit various interests.
aboutPage.audienceText: Our platform mainly targets young people aged 15–25. However, we are open to anyone who wants to develop themselves and build an active and healthy lifestyle. Our goal is to keep young people away from harmful habits and offer opportunities not only in sports but also in intellectual, creative, and social activities.

aboutPage.differenceText: GəncFit offers young people a wide range of opportunities in various fields and supports them in spending their leisure time efficiently. Not just a sports site, we also include social, cultural, and personal development programs that improve both physical health and creative abilities.
